alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jones and eastern Fisher Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Neinda, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Rotan, Roby, Hawley, Lueders, Sylvester, Neinda, Noodle, Mccaulley, Nugent, Avoca, Longworth, Funston, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Ranch Road 126, Hitson, Tuxedo, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Texas.
